alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Gibson; Knox; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 9:59AM EST until February 03 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... White River from Edwardsport to Hazleton. .Minor river flooding is expected to develop on lower parts of the White River today and late this week and weekend. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Petersburg. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding affects agricultural lands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EST Tuesday /8:30 AM CST Tuesday/ the stage was 15.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 16.4 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued late tonight by around 100 AM EST /midnight CST/.
